content: this elegant asymmetrical four-season shawl is much simpler than it looks--you ll have the stitch pattern memorized before the sun sets behind the sea basic puff stitches combine with a lace trim to make for a shawl that s a perfect mix of squish fluff and fancy and the yarn two easy care acrylics come together to create a scarf that s as uncomplicated to wash as it is to crochet skills required include double_crochet chains and single_crochet less experienced crocheters might find the stitch chart a helpful addition to the written pattern this ad-free printable pdf includes a written pattern stitch chart and several photos photos are separate from the written pattern so you may choose to print them or conserve ink see all my free crochet scarf patterns here 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/tag/scarf/
